message.body: Hey! So Richard & I will be in sf this evening - Monday. I would love to see you if you're around!
Hiiii!!!! do you guys want to come over for dinner tomorrow night, or grab lunch or something?? Yay!!!
Hey do you guys have a place to stay?
We're staying with some friends by Hayes & ashbury - but thank you! There was some talk about going to lucky 13 tomorrow evening, maybe y'all can come too?
